snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan of Wisconsin, now a potential 2016 presidential candidate, has repeated the sentiment that urban America gave President Obama the prize.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan of Wisconsin, potential 2016 presidential candidate, attributes Pres Obama's re-election to urban vote, assessment that seems to ignore that Republican ticket also lost big in some rural, mostly white states.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JENNIFER STEINHAUER
byline.contributor: Sarah Cohen and Dalia Sussman contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan of Wisconsin, now a potential 2016 presidential candidate, has repeated the sentiment that urban America gave President Obama the prize.

headline.main: Ryan Sees Urban Vote as Reason G.O.P. Lost
headline.print_headline: Ryan Sees Urban Vote As Reason G.O.P. Lost
